name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored.
enhanced_desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored, and increases Dewdrop's DMG multiplier by 40% of the original multiplier.
